Articles.Content:
Condor-1

Simple, easy to fly, docking capable Single Stage to Orbit spaceplane. Has around 400 m/s of delta-v left in orbit for all your... well, orbital needs! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mSd48)

DOWNLOAD LINK:

[Condor-1 Crew SSTO](https://dl.orangedox.com/DXtnbxBGDeJmZdFncI/Condor-1%20Crew%20SSTO.craft)

ACTION GROUPS:

1 - Toggle Jet

2 - Toggle Rocket Engines

3 - Toggle Intakes
